root.name: Heroes of Might and Magic V: Tribes of the East
root.description: Tribes of the East is a second expansion to Heroes of Might and Magic V, following Hammers of Fate. Unlike Hammers of Fate, it is stand-alone and does not require the base game to play. The major additions of Tribes of the East consist of a new, difficult campaign that continues the story of Heroes of Might and Magic V and sets the stage for Dark Messiah of Might and Magic. It adds the new might-oriented Stronghold faction consisting of Orcs and also adds alternate upgrades for all of the creatures of the other factions, creating new strategic opportunities for the player
